color: The color on the left side of the profile.
link: The blue text that appears on the upper edge of the profile.
image: The image that appears on the lower side of the profile.
discord: Discord Username which includes the discriminator.
irl_name: Your name which you use in real life.
friendly_name: The name which only close friends can call you by this badboi.
nationality: Your nationality based on your home-country
ig_name: The name that you use to refer to yourself in the game.
games: The games which you enjoyed playing.
school: The name of your offline battleground.

best_friends: The guys who always beside you.

hidden: The keys from were hidden from the profile.
